contact.introBlurb: Boris is an AI & Software Engineer specializing in intelligent systems, automation, and full-stack development. Currently at ADGroupe, he builds high-performance digital systems using modern AI tools like Cursor and Windsurf. With 6+ years of experience, he combines software architecture expertise with creative tech design.
